power.title: Arcane Bolt
power.fluff: An arrow of force appears next to you, waiting for your gesture that will send it on an unerring path toward an enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes force damage equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. If the target is within 10 squares, the damage increases by +3. If the target is within 5 squares, the damage increases by an additional +3.

power.title: Blissful Ignorance
power.fluff: A tangle of soothing magic distracts your enemies, leaving them vulnerable as they chase after pleasant dreams

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is distracted until the end of your next turn.
While distracted, each target is slowed and can't take opportunity actions or immediate actions.

If you use this power outside of combat, each target also takes a -5 penalty to Perception, and creatures a target was not aware of can sneak through a target's field of vision as though it had concealment.
If a target was not aware of you when you use this power, it is not aware of being affected.

power.title: Call the Night Winds
power.fluff: Howling night winds spiral around you before striking to chill all in their way

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The blast creates a zone of howling winds that lasts until the end of your next turn.
The zone is heavily obscured to creatures other than you, and any enemy that starts its turn in the zone is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Chill Claws
power.fluff: Skeletal hands appear around your targets, ripping into them with icy claws and sapping their will to fight

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure skeletal claws in each target's space until the end of your next turn. Each claw moves with the corresponding target, remaining in its space.
While the claw occupies the target's space, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls. This increases to a -4 penalty for triggered attack rolls.

power.title: Cinderfall
power.fluff: A thousand motes of fire momentarily linger in the air before streaking toward a single foe that has managed to avoid them

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: One target you missed in the burst takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. For each additional target you missed, you deal an additional +2 fire damage.

power.title: Color Spray
power.fluff: A brilliant blast of flashing colors springs from your outstretched fingers, knocking nearby enemies senseless

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d4 + Intelligence modifier radiant damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Radiant damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Cordon of Bones
power.fluff: Bones spring up from the ground and tear from your dying enemies to form a jagged cordon

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude
+2 bonus to the attack roll against a bloodied creature that has bones

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier damage. An additional +1d6 damage against a bloodied creature that has bones.
A creature reduced to 0 hit points or less by this attack is instantly killed.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of jagged bones until the end of your next turn.
Creatures take a -2 penalty to attack rolls and a -4 penalty to Acrobatics and Athletics checks while in the zone.

Any creature that enters the zone or falls prone in the zone takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature reduced to 0 hit points or less by this damage is instantly killed. The damage increases by 2 for each creature killed by the initial attack or this damage. A creature can only take this damage once per turn.

power.title: Ebony Razors
power.fluff: You hurl blinding shadows, then solidify them into warding shards of psychic energy

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d12 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.target: you or an ally adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the secondary target has the following benefits:
Concealment against the primary targets.

When an adjacent enemy attacks the target, after the attack has been resolved that enemy takes psychic damage. The psychic damage equals your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus + 2 for each creature you missed with the primary attack.

power.title: Fire Shroud
power.fluff: With a subtle gesture, you wreathe nearby enemies in flames

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If the target is not adjacent to you or any of your allies, fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Grim Shadow
power.fluff: Reaching into the Shadowfell, you cast a tangible, looming shadow that strikes fear into the living it covers

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage
If the target is living, it takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target takes a -2 penalty to Will until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hypnotic Pattern
power.fluff: A swirling pattern of colors appears before your foes, causing their eyes to glaze over as the pattern enthralls them and lures them closer

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a swirling pattern of colors and lights in an unoccupied square within range until the end of your next turn. The swirling pattern does not occupy its square.
A creature can destroy the pattern by using a standard action to make a Diplomacy check against a DC of 10 + your attack bonus with this power.
While the swirling pattern exists, you can use the Hypnotic Draw attack at-will, using the swirling pattern's square as the origin square.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature begins its turn within 3 squares of the swirling pattern

section.name: Attack:
section.target: the triggering creature within the burst
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You pull the target 3 squares towards the pattern, and the target can enter the pattern's square.
The target is slowed until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is marked by the swirling pattern.

power.title: Icy Rays
power.fluff: You fire two bolts of brilliant blue-white energy that freeze your enemies in place for a short time

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex
If you target only one creature, roll twice and use the higher result

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Maze of Mirrors
power.fluff: You envelop your enemies in an illusory labyrinth of mirrors, which conceals the world around them

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the target is trapped in the illusion until the end of your next turn.
While trapped, the target is immobilized and takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is distracted by the mirrors until the end of your next turn.
While distracted, the target is slowed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

power.title: Melting Pool
power.fluff: You create an extradimensional pool of acid beneath your enemies' feet

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude
+2 to attack rolls against prone targets

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, or 2d6 + Intelligence modifier acid damage against a prone target.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The floor in the burst is permanently reduced to difficult terrain.

power.title: Radiant Pillar
power.fluff: You conjure a cylinder of light that illuminates the battlefield, searing the eyes of your foes

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The burst creates a zone of bright light until the end of your next turn. Squares within 2 squares of zone are dimly lit.
Creatures are blinded while within the zone. Creatures your DM decides are especially vulnerable to bright light take a -2 penalty to attack rolls while within the dimly lit area.
If a creature vulnerable to radiant damage starts its turn within the zone, it takes radiant damage equal to twice its vulnerability.

power.title: Shock Beetle Swarm
power.fluff: A sudden mass of insects limned with lightning crawls over your foes, energy arcing between your enemies as the swarm feasts on their flesh

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and you conjure a shock beetle in 1 square within the target's space until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You conjure a shock beetle in 1 unoccupied square in the burst until the end of your next turn. If all squares in the burst are occupied, choose 1 square adjacent to the burst instead.
Each enemy that starts its turn in or adjacent to at least 1 square containing a shock beetle takes lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement' enhancement bonus.

power.title: Shock Sphere
power.fluff: You hurl a crackling orb of lightning that explodes at a point you designate, engulfing all nearby creatures in its electric embrace

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.
